EmailTemplate.description: Used on IEP Bank Account Setup OSCAR Process
EmailTemplate.name: IEP Setup Finalization Failed
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} – IEP Account Rejection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
We regret to inform you that your request for registering your Account for EasyPay service has not been approved. Don’t hesitate to contact the IATA Customer Service team for more information.
Thank you,
IATA Customer Service Portal
{!AMS_OSCAR__c.Emails_reference_Id__c}
